#define NutExitCritical (  ) 

Value:

if (runningThread){                                 \
            if (--runningThread->td_cs_level == 0) {        \
                /* printf("Left a: %s.%d - %s\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, runningThread->td_name);  */ \
                pthread_sigmask(SIG_UNBLOCK, &irq_signal, 0);   \
            }                                               \
        } else {                                            \
            if (--main_cs_level == 0) {                     \
                /* printf("Left a: %s.%d - %s\n", __FILE__, __LINE__, "ROOT");  */ \
                pthread_sigmask(SIG_UNBLOCK, &irq_signal, 0);   \
            }                                               \
